oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2002-05-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 9, 2002. Hosted by Patsy Bruce.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Patsy Bruce;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments by Kyle Young / (03:50) Introduction of Justine Gregory with comments and introduction of the host, Patsy Bruce / (06:00) Comments by Patsy Bruce / (08:35) Tennessee (Kim Copeland with Rachel Head and Desiree Garrison) / (14:30) My Love Is Real (Jeff Pearson with Azra Medic) / (19:41) School is fun (Steven Farmer with the Kindergarten Club) / (24:37) Leave Me Alone (Kathy Hussey with Travis Roman and Ben Johnson) / (30:34) Love for you Mama (Les Kerr with Ebony Bowers, Keirra Hobbs and Brittany Lewis) / (37:06) Math Homework (Rich Fagan with Christine Thompson) / (42:00) On the way to California (Bill Golay and Bill Stevens with Lyle Reed) / (49:29) Cows (Bob Spanburgh with Collier Gailmard) / (55:08) Oak Hill blues (Dwight Liles with Jordan Sherman) / (59:55) Kelley Jones comments about the Words and Music program / (01:04:00) Be Alone (Rick Bennett with Mary Catherine Overbey) / (01:08:43) Elements of Life (Richard Shaluly with Reanna Bruey and Leigh Steele) /

(01:14:22) Someday, little lady (Simon McCain with Chelsea Ferguson) / (01:21:59) When my dog died (Dwight Liles with William Decker) / (01:26:19) Kid with constant hunger (Casey Kelly with Spencer Huff) / (01:34:28) Nanny (Tim Carroll with Lindsey Byrne) / (01:39:00) The Struggle and the Hustle (Les Kerr with David Pope) / (01:44:16) I'm running in (Sheila Lawrence and Kyle Woods) / (01:49:53) Playground bully (Casey Kelley with Briana Grysbowski) / (01:57:05) Patsy Bruce with songwriter goals and inspiration and closing comments / END OF PROGRAM.
